channel.title: Run Error
channel.description:
[CODE][3/18/12 5:28 PM]: Server Launched... [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: org.apache.mina .common.RuntimeIOException: Failed to get the default configuration. [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptorCo nfig.<init>(SocketAcceptorConfig.java:54) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.< init>(SocketAcceptor.java:66) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.< init>(SocketAcceptor.java:88) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:124) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: Caused by: java.net.SocketException: Unrecognized Windows Soc kets error: 87: create [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at java.net.ServerSocket.createImpl(Unknown Source) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at java.net.ServerSocket.getImpl(Unknown Source) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at java.net.ServerSocket.getReuseAddress(Unknown Source)
[3/18/12 5:28 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptorCo nfig.<init>(SocketAcceptorConfig.java:52) [3/18/12 5:28 PM]: ... 3 more Press any key to continue . . .
[/CODE] My Run.bat [CODE] @echo off title RS2 Quality+ by Valentino java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause [/CODE]
